name.es,es_419: Exportación de búsquedas para LinkedIn™️(Buscador de correo electrónico)
name.fr: Exportation de recherche pour LinkedIn™️(Email Finder)
name.ja: LinkedIn™️(メールファインダー) の検索エクスポート

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Export leads with email from LinkedIn Search Results to CSV / Excel. Extract B2B data from LinkedIn searches.
short.de: Leads mit E-Mail aus LinkedIn-Suchergebnissen nach CSV/Excel exportieren. B2B-Daten aus LinkedIn-Suchen extrahieren.
short.es,es_419: Exporta clientes potenciales con correo electrónico desde los resultados de búsqueda de LinkedIn a CSV/Excel. Extrae datos B2B de…
short.fr: Exportez des prospects avec e-mail à partir des résultats de recherche LinkedIn vers CSV / Excel. Extrayez les données B2B des…
short.ja: LinkedIn 検索結果からメール付きのリード情報を CSV / Excel にエクスポートします。LinkedIn 検索から B2B データを抽出します。
short.ko: LinkedIn 검색 결과에서 이메일이 포함된 리드를 CSV/Excel로 내보냅니다. LinkedIn 검색에서 B2B 데이터를 추출합니다.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
Scrape and export the leads results of a LinkedIn search into CSV. support People, Company, Group, Event, Learning Course and School.

v2.0.0 Update
- Add enrich email with Email finder API
- Add email finder providers, please contact us to add more providers.
- Most email finders need company name, please choose the extract user's company info option.

🔥 FEATURES
✓ Extract all LinkedIn search types and give you the results in a CSV file
✓ Support People, Company, Group, Event, Learning Course and School search result types
✓ Extract user profiles (company name, school name, address, location and etc)
✓ Extract user connections count, follower count and following count
✓ Extract company Website, Funding and more contact information
✓ Save export history in local storage
✓ Continue task progress from history
✓ Save and download leads list in CSV/EXCEL/JSON format

EXPORT COLUMNS
#Public Identifier, #Profile Link, #First Name, #Last Name, #Full Name, #Headline, #Picture URL, #Connected Date, #Websites, #Phone Numbers, #Wechat, #Twitter, #Email, #Company Name, #Company Title, #School Name, #Degree Name, #Field Of Study, #Industry Name, #Summary, #Location Name, #Country Name, #Address, #Prefer Country Code, #Prefer Language Code, #Birth Date, #Is Student

NOTICE
LinkedIn only displays the first 1000 results of a search, so the tool won't be able to access any more than this. To get more, alter your search query in several ways and extract the results from each variation.

👋 FAQ
If you have any questions, please keep in touch via help@niomaker.com.

🔒 DATA PRIVACY
All data is processed in your local computer, never passing through our web server, and no one knows what you save.

💡 DISCLAIMER
Search Export is not endorsed by or affiliated with the LinkedIn Corporation, registered in the U.S. and other countries. LinkedIn is a trademark of the LinkedIn Corporation.
